page.title: 14N.PEMBROKE/COSHESTON_LEISURE
page.content: In Cosheston village there is not much provided for leisure. For women there is a weekly keepfit class and the Women's Institute. For the children there are cubs and brownies, all in the village hall, and for the men, a football team. There is a playing field with swings and two Inns. For most of their entertainment and leisure activties, the villagers would do the same as the people of Pembroke. There is a sports centre in Pembroke and many restaurants and pubs in the town. The nearest cinema is 1O miles away in Tenby. There are discos and youth clubs for young people and there is a theatre in Milford Haven. There are also many beaches and miles of lovely countryside in the area. Part of the block is in Pembrokeshire National Park.
